mapper.select: SELECT GUID, FIELDFK, CODE, CRVALUE, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM MA_CLASS_FIELD_CR_DETAIL
SELECT GUID, FIELDFK, CODE, CRVALUE, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM MA_CLASS_FIELD_CR_DETAIL WHERE GUID=#GUID#

SELECT GUID, FIELDFK, CODE, CRVALUE, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM MA_CLASS_FIELD_CR_DETAIL
and GUID=#GUID# and FIELDFK=#FIELDFK# and CODE=#CODE# and CRVALUE=#CRVALUE#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MA_CLASS_FIELD_CR_DETAIL(GUID, FIELDFK, CODE, CRVALUE, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID ) VALUES(#GUID#, #FIELDFK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CODE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CRVALUE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
